title: From one to many: Dvorak's 'Slavic Dance No. 7'
brief_description: Excerpt from Bruno Bozzetto’s “Allegro Non Troppo”. An animated comment on social confirmity set to the music of Dvorak. Featuring the Berlin Philharmonic Orchestra conducted by Herbert Von Karajan. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
